data.title: EEG/PrTMS Therapy in Dallas
data.meta_description: Trusted Internal Medicine serving Dallas, TX. Contact us at 214-879-9966 or visit us at 8440 Walnut Hill Ln, Suite #200 Professional Building 4, Dallas, TX 75231: Gary Goff MD
data.text:
To book an appointment – please email neuromod@garygoffmd.com or 214.879.9966 today!

Nearly 1/5 adults in the United States experience mental health conditions annually. Many of these patients don’t respond to oral medications, or the side-effects of these medicines cause further discomfort. That is why Dr. Gary Goff and his team have invested in industry-leading technology that allows their team of Dallas-based professionals to offer PrTMS (personalized repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation) to the metroplex.

EEG/PrTMS therapy is an effective treatment option for individuals suffering from:

Depression

Postpartum Depression

Anxiety

Bipolar Disorder

PTSD (post-traumatic stress disorder)

OCD (obsessive-compulsive disorder)

The Dr. Goff team has invested in cutting-edge EEG/PrTMS equipment (the Cognionics Quick 20 wireless by PeakLogic) to deliver a noninvasive and drug-free treatment options for their patients. Using magnetic stimulation to evoke the body’s natural response by stimulation specific nerve activity to help influence the levels of important transmitters (like Dopamine) in the brain. This type of treatment is call neuromodulation.

Treatment therapy is comfortable, does not require sedation, and is completed in a matter of minutes (usually 30 minutes). Patients can usually achieve peak performance in just 36 treatments (given 5 days per week)

Leveraging proprietary software, each patients’ EEG readout is individually diagnosed by our team of EEG/PrTMS specialists to determine the appropriate dosage and treatment plan.
